title: Communications and collaboration best practices for remote workers
description: It’s safe to say the distributed workforce isn’t a trend - it is here to stay.
content: According to data from the Office of National Statistics,over 1.5 million people in the UK work from home. With the onset of COVID-19, this new paradigm will increase, reaching more businesses and employees than anyone could have imagined just six short month… [+5424 chars]
